attributes.action: Sign To Help Secure Boardmasters Festival Newquay's Future
attributes.additional_details:
The Future of Boardmasters Music/Skate/Surf/Arts Festival is under threat due to Sounds Restrictions placed this year (2013) by Licensing Officers being monitored at 2013's Event. These Restrictions could harm the future of Boardmasters Events at Newquay's Fistral & Watergate Bay Sites.
Boardmasters generates £19 Million in just 3 days anually to Cornwalls Economy.
Celebrate & Embrace Surf Culture &
'Sign To Secure' TODAY.
(20,000 signatures required)

Generated by ChalkUk Magazine
www.chalkukmagazine.co.uk
